Interface Shape

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Shape>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Circle, ComposedShape, Polygon, PolygonDyn, PolygonVect, Rectangle, Triangle

    public interface Shape
extends java.lang.Comparable<Shape>
    This interface is the basis of every shape classes.
    Author:
    Yusuf Can
